'Exists' are a Malaysian alternative pop/ rock band formed in Johor,
Malaysia in 1991. The group comprises Joey (lead vocals), Along (guitar),
Musa (bass guitar) and Ujang (drums).

Exists achieved local fame with the release of their single "Untukmu Ibu",
followed by their debut album, [[Exist (album)|Exist]] (1991). The group follows
up with [[Anugerah (album)|Anugerah]] (1994). Their next release, [[Diammu
Gunung Berapi (album)|Diammu Gunung Berapi]] (2003) quickly rose the band's name
in the local music industry. Their next album, Jangan Gentar (1997) were
released. Following with [[Mutan (album)|Mutan]] (1998). The following years
took Exists on a new shift in their musical style with their release of [[Ada
(album)|Ada]] (2001), [[Seperti Dulu (album)|Seperti Dulu]] (2003) and their
latest release, [[Paragon (Exists album)|Paragon]] (2003).
